channel.title: Fixed
channel.description:
I recently downloaded Zenith scape, that was just released. I wanted to check it out. So i started by changing my loader.java's ip to 127.0.0.1, same with the client.java's ip's. But its stuck at
1% Checking for updates.
Any possible solutions.?
For my compiler i'm using 1.7.0 instead of 1.7.0_04 if that matters.
FIXED. IT WAS UTORRENT.

item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
